entry.title: Severe Weather Statement issued July 07 at 8:26PM AKDT until July 07 at 9:00PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...THE SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING FOR EAST CENTRAL YUKON FLATS AND SURROUNDING UPLANDS WILL EXPIRE AT 830 PM AKDT... The severe thunderstorm which prompted the warning has moved out of the warned area but another Severe Thunderstorm Warning is in effect.

entry.title: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 8:25PM AKDT until July 07 at 9:00PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands in Alaska... * Until 900 PM AKDT. * At 825 PM AKDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 38 miles southeast of Fort Yukon, moving northeast at 65 mph.

entry.title: Flood Advisory issued July 07 at 8:23PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: .Very warm temperatures, in the 70s to 80s, in Northern Lynn Canal is causing snow to melt, which is causing rivers to rise. ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...The Taiya River near areas along low lying portions of the Chilkoot Trail.

entry.summary: ...Warm Temperatures through Sunday... Highest temperatures are expected today and possibly Saturday with temperatures warming into the upper 60s along the northern and central gulf coast and into the low 70s along the southern Gulf coast. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 8:16AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Heavy Rainfall and Rising River Levels This Weekend... Heavy rainfall across Brooks Range and North Slope will result in rising water levels on streams and rivers. Rainfall totals of 1.0 to 1.5 inches are expected Friday evening through Saturday evening from the Colville River near Umiat east to the Ivishak River. Water levels will rise significantly and may approach
entry.cap:areaDesc: Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Northeastern Brooks Range; Northwestern Brooks Range

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 8:15AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Heavy Rainfall and Rising Rivers This Weekend... Heavy rainfall is expect tonight and Saturday across the Central and Eastern Brooks Range. This will cause rising water levels on streams and rivers draining the Central and Eastern Brooks Range this weekend. Rainfall totals of 1.0 to 1.5 inches are expected tonight through Saturday.
